channel.title: Posts on Tractor Fox Short Film Festival 2017
channel.author: Alexander Ivanov

item.title: Festival Date Announced for 2018
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
Tractor Fox Short Film Festival 2018

Exciting news! The tractorfox short film festival will be held in June, to align with the Edinburgh film festival. A real treat for movie goers everywhere, more details to be announced soonâ€¦

item.title: Venue confirmed
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description:
VENUE CONFIRMED We are happy to announce that the 23rd of December has been booked at the Roseburn bar hire room, also known as the Rosey B VIP.

VENUE CANCELLED Unfortunately, the Rosey B VIP had to cancel due to the rugby being on. Fortunately, Steven and Summer donated their abode to welcome the TractorFox delegates.

item.title: Festival Date Announcement
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: We are pleased to announce that the festival will take place on the 23rd of December. Details on the venue will be released shortly.

item.title: Tractor Fox Short Film Festival 2017 Idea Conceived
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: Whilst getting inspiration at the Edinburgh Short Film Festival, the team had their eureka moment! Plans were afoot to make this the event of the year!

item.title: Tractor Fox Concept Born
item.author: Alexander Ivanov
item.description: The exact data is unknown, but whilst attending the University of Edinburgh, the idea of Tractor Fox emerged organically after some Galahads.
